workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.3566175214666569 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.13618288861075567 --weight-decay 0.0009117201769965947 --lr 2.527176570545155e-05 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 157760 --max-lr 0.000713760481190113 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.5315456165297547 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.11052941475342137 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
